reviewText:
I guess I will never understand how these types of films get absolutely no promotional solicitation.

This film is excellent.  You are left feeling a connection to the characters and wanting to know more.  The events (although unfortunate) are realistic and relatable.

I would (and already have) recommend this film to others.

I really enjoyed this film... The relationship that Treasure had with her mother was unfortunately, not far from reality in some cases.  I thought the activities/events of prison life was really bold of HBO and I was impressed with their dedication to keep things in line with reality.  I think the acting in the film, especially by Treasure, was very well presented.  The characters were believable and realistic.  Great job on this one...

I LOVED THIS FILM!
THE MOVIE WAS RAW,AND IT LEFT YOU GUESSING, UNTIL THE END!
THE GIRLS GOT, DOWN RIGHT NASTY, BUT, I GUESS, THAT IS WHAT HAPPENS, IN THE PRISON, LIFE!
Deep movie very good

This is a movie that led me to believe one thing and then the ending let me know the truth.  I felt so sorry the main character but it lets you know that you have to put the time into a person before you trust them completely.

I like prison movies,I guest because I never been or plan on going,I am really intetested in whats it like. This movie was not like prison stories ,starring Rae Dawn Chong,but it has a nice twist to the story.
not what I expected to much negativity and sexual content too much referenced. The actors were not very good. Just didn't like it that much.
This movie will keep you on your toes!! You learn something new about the main charecter at every turn! The ending was not only unexpected but riveting!!
it's ok if you had  last few movies on the shelf, would reccomend it to someone who had this type of experience
I bought this movie for my daughter and she enjoyed it very much! I have no more to say about this product.

This is a good movie that should be shown in juvenile detention centers for girls so that they can see that's is not fun nor do they want the bragging rights of the things they'll experience if they continue to commit crimes and eventually be placed in an adult women's correctional facility!!!!
this is one of the best films i have seen. its not too long so my bum doesnt start to ache and the characters are really believable... I will be watching this again and again i assure you.
I did not thinkg this movie would be a good as it was. The suprise ending was amazing. I would suggest this if you into movies that have depth.
This movie is really good, acting could be better but the story was cool and it's a shame that the main character has not been in another movie.
Very good, realistic prison life portrayal of a young girl looking for answers and her mother and she discovers some shocking truths.

This movie is soooooo good. This movie is real, its raw and I loved it. I highly recommend this one. The story line was so well thought out, the movie is good from start to finish. Thumbs up for this one
After 6 months, I am still waiting for my movies. I have been contacting them but nobody wanna reply to my questions. Where is my order?did you guys shipped it to the wrong adress?

EXCELLENT, MOVIE!!!!  THE ENDING WAS A REAL HEAD TURNER/SHOCKER!  I THOROUGHLY ENJOYED IT!!! WASN'T SURE ABOUT STORY LINE INITIALLY BUT, THE CHARACTER COMPLEXITIES INVOLVED AND THE MOTHER/CHILD RELATIONSHIP/BOND IS ONE THAT UNDENIABLY MUST BE EXPERIENCED AT ALL COSTS FOR MANY OF THESE CHARACTERS.

This move was wack as hell ! lmao some of the parts were hilarious. Even though this was not suppose to be a funny movie. Omg the storyline was corny, the acting was corny .. smh I brought this, watched it, and never put it back in my dvd player lol
I loved this movie also. it is a good movie to show young girls and what could happen to them when they go to jail.  excellent movie and actress
Weird movie, but I actually enjoyed it.

This movie is the best. I had this movie on VHS years ago so I couldn't wait to get it on DVD. Yolanda Ross captures the emotion of a young lady locked away and wanting to be with her mother in a nearby prison. She shines just as she did in Antwone Fisher. The character played by Madusa is a phenom. She is an underground hip hop artist and also produces. The cast as whole are not mega stars but they have been seen on screen for quite a while.
i saw this movie on HBO for the first time years ago and bought it to have in my collection....this is a really good female prison movie with twists and turns that will leave you shocked!

Since I work in a women's correctional facility I am very critical on the realism aspect of these types of films. I had to questions some of the policies and procedures that were depicted of the prison staff. The speculum scene was totally false at least in the Virginia Dept. of Corrections. They would never line the ladies up and use the same medical instrument on each. Male officers are never allowed to see female offenders naked. I'm a male officer and have worked in a women's prison for over five years and I have never seen an offender naked. As far as the crooked officer that was running drugs out of the prison, yeah right that would never happen. If I have learned anything about working with women, they can get jealous over the smallest things and trust me if they saw or even suspected that somebody was getting something that they weren't they would be writing downtown and call the 800 number hotline so fast, that that man would have lasted three days. He would have been under investigation within 48 hours. Other than that the actions of the offenders was well depicted.

I just resently purchased this film to watch and it blew me away. Usually I don't watch independent films, because the acting is not good and the film is quite choppy; however this movie was recommended to see the struggles of women life story while in prison. The main character Treasure Lee was looking for acceptance from a mother "Brownie" who didn't even know her existence. Treasure allowed the system to be place of residence and for her gang "GG's" to become her family. Throughout the movie you saw Treasure and Brownie became a family and how Treasure pushed the ones that always had her back against the wall. The director did a wonderful job of keeping the storyline interesting and allowing the viewers a true peek inside the correctional facilities. The ending definitely throws you for a loop.
i really like it. is realistic mature . is shows life in many prisons in the country in the past years.

this movie came on HBO a while ago.. and i ordered it 2 wks ago.. just watched it yesterday.. i liked the prison movie alot.. but, i didn't like the ending..it was sad.. how she bonded with the mom that she thought was her's....but , i would recommend this movie.. and it came in mail in 2 days..

This movie was not what I expected. It was well written. I couldn't stop watching it once I started. It is a prison drama with lesbian overtones, but the plot line is what grips you. I would recommend this to all my friends. And watch out for the twist at the end. You'll cry.

I THOUGHT THIS MOVIE WAS JUST GOING TO BE ABOUT JAIL AND HOW HARD WOMEN HAVE IT IN JAIL....BOY WAS I WRONG. THIS MOVIE WAS EXCELLENT. IT CAPTIVES YOU FROM THE OPENING SCENE TO THE END. I WISH THEY WOULD HAVE MADE A SEQUEL, JUST TO CONTINUE THE SUSPENSE. I EVEN SHARED THIS MOVIE WITH FAMILY FRIENDS AND THEY ENJOYED IT. THIS IS A MUST TO ADD TO YOUR COLLECTION.
This movie 1st caught my eye on HBO. I always missed the beginning, so now I can watch it all the time. It's pretty good if your into prison movies.

The movie was pretty raw. It was one of those in your face movies with a griddy look of prison life. The ending was kind of touching. I think it would be a good movie for teenagers to watch in a scared straight program.
Product arrived on time.  Brand new.  Story line is good.  Surpising twist to story.  Highly reccommend to anyone who loves stories about exploring ones self and the past they come from.

I brought this movie based on amazon's reviews. It was a well developed movie and the two main characters made sure you took a walk with them through this movie. The ending most definitely will leave your mouth wide open. Overall I really enjoyed this movie, I believe many who purchase it will not be dissappointed at all.

THIS MOVIE IS THE TALE OF TREASURE LEE. SHES ON A QUEST TO REUNITE WITH HER MOTHER AND SHE WLL DO JUST ABOUT ANYTIME TO FIND HER AND REUNITE.  THE MOVIE IS GREAT. YOU WILL FEEL HER PAIN AND STRUGGLE.  THE ENDING IS A SHOCKER, YOU'LL NEVER SEE IT COMING. GREAT MOVIE BUY IT OR RENT IT.
I'm sooo happy to find this movie and for a great price. I've been looking for it for a long time. It's one of my favorites.
